title: Mister prime minister: Alfred Deakin
brief_description: Provides an overview of Deakin’s life from his birth in a northern inner suburb of Melbourne in 1856 to his death in 1919, and closely examines his involvement in the Federation movement and his dominance of the first decade of Federal politics. Narrated by Roger Climpson.
